ack.p: We thank Ralph Grundel, Krystalynn Frohnapple, Jennifer Ison, Weihua Gao, and the UIC Center for Clinical and Translational Science for assistance in planning this study. Permission to conduct the study was granted by the National Park Service and aided by Joy Marburger. Field, laboratory, and greenhouse data collection was aided by Krystalynn Frohnapple, James Daley, Sarah Dean, Karen Zaya, Saji Abraham, Kevin Feldheim, Kirsten Dittel, Dominick Fosco, Iryna Shak, Jim Scios, Noranne Magee, John Podejko, and James Rollins. Stuart Wagenius helped immensely with data analysis. Boris Igic, Jeremie Fant, Henry Howe, Janet Rizner Backs, Eun Sun Kim, John Wilk, Emi Kuroiwa, Jason Palagi, Jenny Zambrano, Wesley Bickford, David W. Inouye, and two anonymous reviewers provided feedback that improved the manuscript. Any use of trade, firm, or product names is for descriptive purposes only and does not imply endorsement by the U.S. Government. This manuscript was completed in partial fulfillment of the doctoral degree from the Graduate College at the University of Illinois at Chicago to DNZ.
